channel.title: Riwaj Shrestha
channel.description: This is a personal webpage of Riwaj's where he share his research and interest in general.

item.title: Host React Build in Firebase
item.description: In this post, we will guide you through the process of hosting React Build in Firebase. Let’s dive in and get started! Set up a Firebase project: Go to the Firebase Console https://console.firebase.google.com/, sign in, and create a new project. Follow the prompts to set up your project. Install Firebase...

item.title: Setting Up an Ubuntu Server with NGINX, MySQL, Node.js, Git, Docker, and SSL in AWS EC2 Instance
item.description: In this post, we will guide you through the process of creating an instance on Amazon EC2, configuring it with an Ubuntu server, and installing various essential components like NGINX, MySQL, Node.js, Git, Docker, and SSL certificates. By following these step-by-step instructions, you’ll be able to set up a robust...
